author: lgo
msg: * CHANGES: update 1.3.6 description and set release date to today.

author: lgo
msg: On the 1.3.x branch: update version number to 1.3.6.

author: lgo
msg: Revert revision 2344: this change was making serf call handle_response multiple
times in case of an error response, leading to unexpected behavior.

author: lgo
msg: Add a test to validate that serf always calls the application's
handle_response handler when a response arrives, even if an authn callback
is set and the response can't be read.
There's a TODO here: handle_response is currently called with response == NULL,
as if the request got cancelled. I don't think this is right, and it's the cause
of the issues we're trying to fix in r2360.
